problem.markdown:
1. In continuous system the material properties are same throughout the section (x) True () False
2) Dimensions of the members are same throughout the structure in continuous system. () True (x) False

problem.p: 1. In continuous system the material properties are same throughout the section
2) Dimensions of the members are same throughout the structure in continuous system.
3) Using generalized mass and stiffness we can know response.
